entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Camrose
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:04 AM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -29.2°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023
